p: For the preparation of samples, 20 ml of methanol and water (1:1 v/v) were mixed with 1 gram of E. caeruleum samples. This mixture was then heated on a water bath at 70Â°C for 1 h. After cooling, the sample was centrifuged at 4,000 rpm for 10 min. Then 2 ml of sample was filtered with Whatman filter paper into HPLC vials.
